inclusion.criterion: women who got a clear explanation about all treatment options and they chose misoprostol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: women who read and signed an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known allergy to prostaglandins or NSAIDS
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: heavy vaginal bleeding and hemodynamic instability
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has no specific past medical issues, only uses prenatal vitamins. Family history is positive for DM type 2 and HTN.
